data.eml:eml: A revision of the Dibrachys cavus species complex (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Pteromalidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peters, Ralph S., Baur, Hannes (2011): A revision of the Dibrachys cavus species complex (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Pteromalidae). Zootaxa 2937: 1-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202096
